title: How to make beats for rap as a beginner - Quora

response.answer_text: You need to choose a digital audio workstation or (DAW). Some of the most popular DAWs for rap beats are FL Studio, Logic Pro X and Ableton. They all do similar things and choosing one really just comes down to workflow preference IMO. Once you decide on your DAW and have it installed on your computer, YouTube is a tremendous resource to learn how to use it. There are endless tutorial videos for every DAW imaginable and you can spend hours learning different techniques on a daily basis. I am a music producer myself, and this is exactly how I learned everything I know. There are other elements to music production that are worth considering when you’re first starting out like which drumkits and plugins to use within your DAW. You will be need a desktop or laptop and a digital audio workstation (DAW) Like Fl studio, Ableton live, logic, etc. Then you start making beats if you don't know anything about making beats you can watch tutorials on YouTube and you will get better over time and start earning too. Hope this helps.
